This site lists some of the best food options in NYC and SF.

Kimchi Udon from Izakaya MEW (NYC)

An experience you need to try at least once.

Discovered/Recommended by Victoria Wang. There's a lot of good options, but you need to get the Kimchi Udon. Vist their Yelp page here.
